Question.Subject: I need Twitter help!?
Question.Content:
How do I tag someone on a tweet? Like I've seen people and they say @BLAHBLAH is amazing. I want to know how you do that? Might be a stupid question but I just got Twitter.
Plus would anyone like to follow me on Twitter at (@sparkleozzy) or give me your URLs and i'll followw you.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
just click the retweet button or reply button, a reply will give you @whoever your replying to then your message, a retweet gives you @whoever twits you want to retweet to your followers... they are found at the lower right of each tweet...
